VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oversized Loads relative to E-Commerce Parcels?
SRP.A: Oversized Loads is {below} E-Commerce Parcels in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total on-time delivery rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oversized Loads}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total on-time delivery rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Pharmaceuticals}.

VE.Q: What is Oversized Loads's On-Time Delivery Rate in 1983?
VE.A: Oversized Loads's on-time delivery rate in 1983 is {100} %.

VE.Q: What are the on-time delivery rate of Emergency Shipments, Oversized Loads, and E-Commerce Parcels in 1985?
VE.A: Emergency Shipments's on-time delivery rate is {100} %, Oversized Loads's on-time delivery rate is {100} %, E-Commerce Parcels's on-time delivery rate is {100} %.

EVJ.A: The global minimum on-time delivery rate is {78.52} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest On-Time Delivery Rate level recorded for E-Commerce Parcels?
What is the lowest On-Time Delivery Rate level recorded for E-Commerce Parcels?

SC.Q: What is the average total On-Time Delivery Rate?
SC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate is {371.35} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total On-Time Delivery Rate exceed 374.60 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total On-Time Delivery Rate go below 368.61 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1984, was the average total On-Time Delivery Rate higher or lower than between 1984 and 1985?
NC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate between 1983 and 1984 was {lower} than between 1984 and 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total On-Time Delivery Rate in 1983 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total on-time delivery rate in 1983 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1985, did the total On-Time Delivery Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total on-time delivery rate between 1984 and 1985 was {larger} than between 1983 and 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1985, was the average total On-Time Delivery Rate higher or lower than between 1983 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total on-time delivery rate between 1983 and 1985 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1984.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oversized Loads} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Pharmaceuticals, E-Commerce Parcels, Oversized Loads, Emergency Shipments}.
